item.title: COCOB: An optimizer with a learning rate
item.description:
At the nurture.ai’s NIPS paper implementation challenge, I implemented and validate the paper ‘Training Deep Networks without Learning Rates Through Coin Betting’.
More details at my github repo: https://github.com/anandsaha/nips.cocob.pytorch
